Class GameFile

java.lang.Object
GameFile
public class GameFile extends Object
Class handling game data manipulation, loading, and saving

This class is responsible for saving the game. It collects data, stores into save files, and can be loaded for future gaming sessions.

      Save the player's progress to a save slot.
      Parameters:
      saveSlot - the save slot selected that will contain the data
      gameData - the data containing the player's progress
      invenData - the data containing the player's inventory
